- You should think about how to efficiently explore the relationship between the objects and the machine.

You will be prompted at each turn to choose actions.

But back to object 0. The first time, when object 0 was alone on the machine, the light was off. Then adding object 1 (which seems like a blicket) made it on. So if 0 were a blicket, maybe the light would have been on even without 1? Since when 0 was alone it was off, probably 0 isn't a blicket. 

So the answer is probably False.
</think>
